FOSSEE/Common-Interface-Project.summary: Recent activities in the Common-Interface-Project repository have focused on updating the XmlParser file, including geometry of Splitblock, and refining xsl files for geometry point values. Multiple pull requests have been merged to address these updates, reflecting ongoing efforts to enhance and simplify the codebase.

FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_hackathon.summary: The scilab_case_study_hackathon repository has seen updates to content, including the addition of new logos and modifications to meta keywords. These changes aim to improve the overall presentation and accessibility of the repository, with multiple push events and pull requests facilitating these enhancements.

FOSSEE/fossee-banners.summary: Activities in the fossee-banners repository have centered around updating and adding new banners, including adjustments to imagery and links. These updates have been implemented through a series of push events and pull requests, ensuring the repository remains current and visually engaging.

FOSSEE/certificate-generator.summary: The certificate-generator repository has been updated with the addition of Arduino Workshop Certificates, reflecting the repository's ongoing role in generating certificates for various workshops and events.

FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_portal.summary: The scilab_case_study_portal repository has undergone updates, including the addition of descriptions under project titles, which were directly added from GitHub. This activity highlights the repository's focus on providing detailed and accurate information.
